title: "Tanks" Coming into Midlane
body: So ive been seeing in my recent games and other pro players experimenting are using tank mages like lissandra and Galio being very viable and sustainable against many of the burst assassin midlaners we have seen due to their many buffs. Could this mean that tanky midlane champs like lissandra can shutdown the assassin midlane or can be a new counter for the adc buff happening next patch. What do yall think am i wrong or "right" i want to know the communities opinion and see if a more diverse roster in the midlane come about.
